languages.text: "Все верно. А еще он жаждет, чтобы это видели ваши подданные. В назидание, так сказать. Отказывать кардиналу уже само по себе грех, но казнить святого..."

"That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."
languages.original_text: "Все верно. А еще он жаждет, чтобы это видели ваши подданные. В назидание, так сказать. Отказывать кардиналу уже само по себе грех, но казнить святого..."

traits.locale_text: "That is correct. On top of that, he insists on your subjects witnessing it. As a lesson to them, so to say. To refuse a Cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute a saint..."
"That is correct. On top of that, he insists on your subjects witnessing it. As a lesson to them, so to say. To refuse a Cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute a saint..."
"That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a Cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute a saint..."
"That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a Cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute a saint..."

"That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

"That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

languages.text: "Das ist korrekt. Außerdem besteht er darauf, dass Eure Untertanen dabei sind ... um ihnen eine Lektion zu erteilen. Sich einem Kardinal zu widersetzen, ist an sich schon gottlos, aber einen Heiligen hinzurichten ..."
languages.original_text: "That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist korrekt. Außerdem besteht er darauf, dass Eure Untertanen dabei sind ... um ihnen eine Lektion zu erteilen. Sich einem Kardinal zu widersetzen, ist an sich schon gottlos, aber einen Heiligen hinzurichten ..."

languages.text: « Tout à fait. De plus, il insiste pour que vos sujets en soient témoins afin qu'ils en tirent une leçon, pour ainsi dire. Refuser la demande d'un cardinal est un acte impie en soi, mais exécuter quelqu'un qui a tout d'un saint... »
languages.original_text: "That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. De plus, il insiste pour que vos sujets en soient témoins afin qu'ils en tirent une leçon, pour ainsi dire. Refuser la demande d'un cardinal est un acte impie en soi, mais exécuter quelqu'un qui a tout d'un saint... »

languages.text: “是这样的。而且不仅如此，他要求您的臣民亲眼见证这场行刑，希望所有人能以此为戒。若是拒绝红衣主教的命令，这本身便是不虔之举，可若是处决一位除了没有得到册封，其他方面与圣人无异的主教……”
languages.original_text: "That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

traits.locale_text: “是这样的。而且不仅如此，他要求您的臣民亲眼见证这场行刑，希望所有人能以此为戒。若是拒绝红衣主教的命令，这本身便是不虔之举，可若是处决一位除了没有得到册封，其他方面与圣人无异的主教……”

languages.text: «Así es. Además, insiste en que sus súbditos sean testigos. Como lección para ellos, por así decirlo. Rechazar la petición de un cardenal es un acto impío, pero ejecutar a alguien que es prácticamente un santo...».
languages.original_text: "That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Además, insiste en que sus súbditos sean testigos. Como lección para ellos, por así decirlo. Rechazar la petición de un cardenal es un acto impío, pero ejecutar a alguien que es prácticamente un santo...».

languages.text: 「その通りです。さらに枢機卿は、いわば教訓として、あなたの臣民たちがその一部始終を見届けることを求めています。枢機卿の願いを拒むこと自体が不敬にあたりますが、名ばかりとはいえ聖人たる者を処刑するとなれば…」
languages.original_text: "That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです。さらに枢機卿は、いわば教訓として、あなたの臣民たちがその一部始終を見届けることを求めています。枢機卿の願いを拒むこと自体が不敬にあたりますが、名ばかりとはいえ聖人たる者を処刑するとなれば…」

languages.text: "Doğrudur. Ayrıca tebaanızın buna şahitlik etmesinde ısrarcı. Tabiri caizse onlara ibret olması adına. Bir kardinali reddetmek, başlı başına dine aykırıdır. Gelgelelim mevzubahis adı dışında her şeyiyle aziz olan birini idam etmekse..."
languages.original_text: "That is correct. In addition, he insists on your subjects bearing witness to it — as a lesson to them, so to speak. To refuse a cardinal is impious in itself, but to execute one who is a saint in all but name..."

traits.locale_text: "Doğrudur. Ayrıca, tebaanızın buna şahitlik etmesinde ısrarcı. Tabiri caizse onlara ibret olması adına. Bir kardinali reddetmek başlı başına dine aykırıdır ancak mevzubahis adı dışında her şeyiyle aziz olan birini idam etmekse..."
